name: Tales From The Cache
storyline:
Never before have you experienced a treasure hunting game like TFTC. Plunge into an atmospheric open-world, teeming with life. Just remember, you are not just a visitor in this world, you are a living and breathing part of it.
Apart from being a treasure hunter, you need to solve the mystery of your missing father.
summary: The exciting world of treasure hunting. Challenge yourself to find secret locations, solve challenging puzzles and explore abandoned places. Watch out for traps!
